question: Write the most likely major product(s) of each of the following haloalkanes with sodium ethoxide in ethanol or potassium *tert*-butoxide in 2-methyl-2-propanol (*tert*-butyl alcohol). **(a)** Chloromethane; **(b)** 1-bromopentane; **(c)** 2-bromopentane; **(d)** 1-chloro-1-methylcyclohexane; **(e)** (1-bromoethyl)-cyclopentane; **(f)** (2*R*,3*R*)-2-chloro-3-ethylhexane; **(g)** (2*R*,3*S*)-2-chloro-3- ethylhexane; **(h)** (2*S*,3*R*)-2-chloro-3-ethylhexane.
